title: Project Management - Handle Scope Creep
description: During a project, a client asks a technician to perform a task that is outside the original scope of work.

tasks.description: The technician politely informs the client that the request is out of scope and that they should speak to the project manager.
tasks.expected_outcome: The technician correctly avoids performing out-of-scope work and directs the client to the proper channel.

tasks.description: The project manager contacts the client to discuss the new request.
tasks.expected_outcome: The PM and client discuss the new requirement.

tasks.description: The project manager creates a formal change order for the additional work, which the client approves.
tasks.expected_outcome: The scope creep is managed formally through a change order, ensuring the work is properly billed.
